name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Caleb Daniel FOX, Petitioner

judges: Justice Wecht did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Caleb Daniel FOX, Petitioner

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 20th day of October, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the order of the Superior Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED for proceedings consistent with Commonwealth v. Lutz-Morrison, 636 Pa. 395, 143 A.3d 891 (2016).
Justice Wecht did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
160 A.3d 755
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Caleb Daniel FOX, Petitioner
No. 343 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
DECIDED: October 20, 2016
